content: Focus: Code Structure, Web Development and Flutter

Focus: Android Development and System Development

description: Create a responsive website using HTML to structure content, CSS to handle visual style, and JavaScript to develop interactive experiences. ​
Prepare for a coding interview, learn best approaches to problem-solving, and build portfolio-ready projects you can share during job interviews.
Learn Bootstrap CSS Framework to create webpages and work with GitHub repositories and version control.
Learn to use React in relation to Javascript libraries and frameworks.
Manage a project in GitHub using version control in Git, Git repositories and the Linux Terminal.
Design and build a simple Django app.
Build a full stack application using Django that stores its data in models on a MySQL database and updates its pages with forms and API endpoints.​
Learned common concepts related to full stack development
Used different environments that web applications are deployed to.

blog.title: User Experience Design – A little more than just design
